list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: tell someone about something; give an account of an event or experience.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I recounted the tale to Steve
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi kể lại câu chuyện với Steve

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an act or instance of giving an account of an event or experience.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: one woman's recount of a prolonged battle with “huge centipedes.”
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một cuộc chiến kéo dài của một người phụ nữ với những con rết lớn.

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an act of counting something again, especially votes in an election.
